Package util

Class ListGraph

java.lang.Object
util.AbstractGraph
util.ListGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
Graph
public class ListGraph extends AbstractGraph
A ListGraph is an extension of the AbstractGraph abstract class that uses an array of lists to represent the edges.

    • loadEdgesFromFile

      public void loadEdgesFromFile(BufferedReader bufferedReader) throws IOException
      Load the edges of a graph from the data in an input file. The file should contain a series of lines, each line with two or three data values. The first is the source the second is the destination, and the optional third is the weight
      Overrides:
      loadEdgesFromFile in class AbstractGraph
      Parameters:
      bufferedReader - The BufferedReader that is connected to the file that contains the data
      Throws:
      IOException - - If an I/O error occurs
